wikipedia_page.main: Robert Harold Wade (born 12 December 1968) is an English cricketer.  Wade is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium pace.  He was born at Epsom, Surrey.

response: *Robert Wade (born 1962), half of the British screenwriting duo Neal Purvis and Robert Wade
*Robert Wade (chess player) (1921–2008), New Zealand and British chess player
